name: The Suit
description: Of course there's a suit ! And custom-made too !

name: The Golden Armor
description: Possibility to dazzle enemies ... And passers-by ... and you too ... A little bit everyone actually !

name: The Gondor's Horn
description: Help comes every time you blow it. All you have to do is hope that the orcs don't get you first.

name: The Hawaiian Short
description: You can't be good at everything ...

name: The Leather Armor
description: Made of top quality snail leather ! (May possibly smell bad in case of high heat)

name: The Oiled Torso
description: Because you never know, you might as well look cool ...

name: The Pink Short
description: I like this color, it looks good on you !

name: The Poor Man's Loincloth
description: Well, you couldn't walk around naked, could you ?

name: The Princess Dress
description: Because princesses also have the right to be badass.

name: The Barcode
description: It's great for identifying your corpse !

name: The Clover Helmet
description: A regular helmet, decorated with a few four-leaf clovers.

name: The Fish Head
description: Yeah, it's a little bit disgusting ...

name: The Golden Helmet
description: Admit it, you didn't know how heavy gold is. You neck hurts, doesn't it ?

name: The Plastic Crown
description: Pretty powerful for a knock-off !

name: The Red Bandanna
description: Purely aesthetic, the prerogative of real warriors !

name: The Very Long Hair
description: Can be very annoying in the wind.

name: The Big Gun
description: The one that goes "Bang, Bang, Bang" super fast !!

name: The Fishing Rod
description: Because why not ?

name: The Golden Sword
description: How cool does it look ?

name: The Long Sword
description: It's a long sword ... Didn't you read the name or what ?

name: The Piano String
description: For you, the music-loving warriors !

name: The Sassy Answers
description: Not everyone necessarily understands sarcasm, but it's still dassy

name: The Short Sword
description: It's a short sword.

name: The Stiletto Heel
description: Have you ever taken a stiletto heel in the eye ? It hurts like hell !

name: The Tree Branch
description: Found on the side of the road, in the dark and with your eyes closed, she looks vaguely like a real sword.
